alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 2:07AM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 6 to 12 inches. 10 to 20 inches mountains and passes above 5500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on Highways 93 and 375.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
